main event: A vertical visual observation of a small, gray object that moved at a rapid speed, observed by a pilot and deck hand.
interesting points: The object was first observed from the ground and moved at a rapid speed.
The sighting was reported to the authorities.

The witness was asked to complete a detailed questionnaire about the sighting, including information about the weather conditions, the object's appearance and behavior, and their own location and perspective.
The witness was asked to draw a sketch or diagram showing the motion and path of the object.
The report indicates that multiple similar sightings had been reported in the area.
